name: js-apk-template
description: I want to create js applications for my Oculus Quest. So i need a way to  streamline the creation of apkfiles to sideload into my Quest. Therefore I need a project template.

scripts.init: npm run clean && npm install && node scripts/fix-package.json.js && npm init && mkdirp ./src && touch ./src/main.js

author: Edward
